channel.title: ~[317]~dropping items and Crown Help~[317]~
channel.description:
1. When i player drops an item it will says dropping items is disabled, how can i enable dropping items.
2. How can i make my crown like this, it is the Gold Admin crown at the moment.
[IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/23wtgyw.jpg[/img]
Thanks~

item.title: ~[317]~dropping items and Crown Help~[317]~
item.dc:creator: @Butchd12 Butchd12
item.description:
@Butchd12 wrote:

[quote=“mc wobbla, post:3, topic:304631”][quote author=DPreborn link=topic=400913.msg2972285#msg2972285 date=1254036373]

  1. Search for Dropitem
    under it u will see something like this:

if(playerRights == 0){
sM(“Dropping had been disabled, use ::empty”);
return;

or something like that, delete it.
[/quote]

im having the same problem. and ive tried this but nothing happens…[/quote]

Dont forget to compile =)

Read full topic
